name: Hidden in Plain Sight (itch) (Designed By Jonas)
name_original: Hidden in Plain Sight (itch) (Designed By Jonas)
description:
Hidden in Plain Sight is a hidden object game.  The game was a university designed to educate players on the various subcultures that exist in today's society.

Credits

Game Developers:

Jonas Noronha & Saeed Ibrahim

Game Artists:

Salma Eneim & Zachary Salazar

Music Producer:

Jason Baretto
